This app acts like a simple GUI for [Rbitcoin](https://github.com/jangorecki/Rbitcoin) package.

Use it wise, be aware of [MIT](http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT) license on which this app is released.

---

List of available market + currency pairs (can be extended by user by setting options):
```{r}
unique(getOption("Rbitcoin.api.dict")[!is.na(base)],
       by=c("market","base","quote")
       )[,.(market, currency_pair = paste(base,quote,sep=""))]
```

Details of host:

```{r}
data.table(attribute = names(Sys.info()), value = Sys.info())
```

App start:

```{r}
Sys.time()
```
